class  ThisAttributeMap
 internal More...

Detailed Description

This class implements a PyAttachment with hit-testing capabilities.

Use this to attach to dynamic skeletal objects for collision tests.

bool BoxAttachment::collide ( const Vector3 &  start,
const Vector3 &  direction,
float &  distance 
)

Collide method, works out wether the ray intersects with this box attachment.

Parameters:
start the start point in world space of the ray
direction the direction of the ray
distance if this value is > 0 when passed in, it is the distance to the end of the ray, it is also the return value for the distance to the collision impact
Returns:
true if the ray collided

void BoxAttachment::draw ( const Matrix &  worldTransform,
float  lod 
) [virtual]

This method stores the world transform of the box attachment it also performs debug rendering of the attachment if needed.

Parameters:
worldTransform the world transform to render at
lod unused parameter
